duties_responsibilities.duty: Illustrate concepts and ideas for client approval
Correspond with in-house team to efficiently relay ideas into final approved designs
Ensure design concepts conform to specifications and production limitations
Generate pre-production files for sublimation, screen print, and embroidery production
Support and help QC internal production needs
Maintain current technical knowledge utilizing available design resources
Contribute to the team effort by accomplishing tasks on time as needed
Conducts all activities in a safe and efficient manner
Other duties may be assigned to meet business needs

education_certification.credential: Degree in Graphic Design or related field
